name: Heroes of Dire
description: In Heroes of Dire, a new massively-multiplayer tactical role-playing game by Spellbook, players command squads of fighters through strategic turn-based battles to win treasure, fame, and glory for their guilds!
minimum_requirements: OS: XP SP2+ Processor: Intel Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities. DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 600 MB available space
